DOC.brief_summary: Once patient ' postoperative pain intensity reach moderate-to-severe level , randomize receive intranasal ketamine placebo . Patients remain study unit 3 hour post administration ass pain intensity pain relief throughout 3 hour postoperative period .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Intranasal Ketamine Treatment Postoperative Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Healthy patient least 16 year age require two third molar extraction Less 16 year old Other exclusion criterion may apply
